summary: This document contains various financial agreements and forms related to Jeffrey Epstein's accounts with Deutsche Bank, including a custody account agreement, power of attorney, and tax identification forms. It outlines the responsibilities of the bank and the client, as well as the terms for managing Epstein's assets.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary individual associated with the custody account at Deutsche Bank, as indicated throughout the document.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is named as an agent authorized to act on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein under the power of attorney.

persons.name: Josh Rosen
persons.context: Josh Rosen is mentioned as the account opening officer for Epstein's accounts at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is identified as the private banker or client advisor for Epstein's accounts.

connections.description: Darren Indyke is appointed as the agent for Jeffrey Epstein under the power of attorney.
Josh Rosen is the account opening officer for Epstein's accounts at Deutsche Bank.
Paul Morris serves as the private banker or client advisor for Epstein.

events.title: Custody Account Agreement Initiation
events.description: The initiation of a custody account agreement for Jeffrey Epstein with Deutsche Bank.

events.title: Power of Attorney Execution
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein executed a durable general power of attorney appointing Darren Indyke as his agent.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the account holder for a custody account at Deutsche Bank.
Darren Indyke is appointed as Epstein's agent under a power of attorney.
Josh Rosen is identified as the account opening officer for Epstein's accounts.
Paul Morris serves as Epstein's private banker or client advisor.
The document includes various financial agreements and forms related to Epstein's accounts.
